35#include <config.h>
36
37#include <krb5/roken.h>
38
39#ifdef HAVE_WIN32_RAND_S
40static int hasRand_s = 1;
41#endif
42
43void ROKEN_LIB_FUNCTION
44rk_random_init(void)
45{
46#if defined(HAVE_ARC4RANDOM)
47 arc4random_stir();
48#elif defined(HAVE_SRANDOMDEV)
49 srandomdev();
50#elif defined(HAVE_RANDOM)
51 srandom(time(NULL));
52#else
53# ifdef HAVE_WIN32_RAND_S
54 OSVERSIONINFO osInfo;
55
56 osInfo.dwOSVersionInfoSize = sizeof(osInfo);
57 hasRand_s =
58 (GetVersionEx(&osInfo)
59 && ((osInfo.dwMajorVersion > 5) ||
60 (osInfo.dwMajorVersion == 5) && (osInfo.dwMinorVersion >= 1)));
61# endif
62 srand (time(NULL));
63#endif
64}
65
66#ifdef HAVE_WIN32_RAND_S
67unsigned int ROKEN_LIB_FUNCTION
68rk_random(void)
69{
70 if (hasRand_s) {
71 unsigned int n;
72 int code;
73
74 code = rand_s(&n);
75 if (code == 0)
76 return n;
77 }
78
79 return rand();
80}
81#endif
82
